title: Infinite Loop Detected
description: A code loop is repeating indefinitely, causing the application to hang or crash. This could be due to a missing condition or incorrect termination logic.

title: Keyboard Not Found
description: The system is unable to detect a connected keyboard. This might be caused by a hardware failure, a disconnected cable, or missing driver software.

title: 404 Coffee Not Found
description: A humorous placeholder error indicating that a resource or endpoint expected by the application is unavailable. May involve a broken API link or a missing resource.

title: Unexpected Response
description: The application received data or a response in an unexpected format or value, likely due to an issue with the external service or API it relies on.
